channel.title: Teleblock
channel.description: First off if you dont know what your talking about dont post it. second, it dementhium based. ok here what i added to my action sender. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2zf0r2v.jpg[/img] idk why i get this compile issue because i search location.java and it contains it. [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/303gs4i.jpg[/img] please help me!

item.title: Teleblock
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“iownmyscape, post:9, topic:429204”]ohhhhh okay. well if i put it in the method, wont it only be one location instead of a mass location?
want to just teamview me?[/quote]

No, the withinDistance method calculates whether or not the other location is within normal (15) tiles of this one (like a circle).

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblock
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“iownmyscape, post:7, topic:429204”]Why are you still posting pictures?

As you can see, you have to create a Location object with the location you’re trying to compare with, then call it

if (player.getLocation().withinDistance(otherLocation)) { // other stuff } [/quote]
well so i wuld put
if (player.getLocation().withinDistance(1,2)) { ??? where do i put other location?? how does this even work?
w
[/quote]

You put the other location in the method location (hint the name otherLocation).

And the withinDistance method must use a default distance (probably 15 or something.).

Read full topic
